# Splinterlands API Docs (Unofficial)

This repository was created to document the Splinterlands API enpoints.

You can see the site at [http://selabie68.github.io/splinterlands-api-unofficial](http://selabie68.github.io/splinterlands-api-unofficial)

# Contributing

Feel free to contibrute to the repository by making a pull request.

- The only file you need is `insomnia.json`
- Simply import it in to the [Insomnia Core App](https://insomnia.rest/) make the changes and export using `Insomnia v4 (JSON)`
- Before making your pull request be sure to run `yarn prettier` this will format the json file to make it more human-readable.
